23841.name: New Page
23841.description:
Just a shortcut to create a new page or multiple pages by the keyboard.

You can

Run it without parameter to create a new page,

Or run it with these 4 shapes of parameters:

  • A single name to create a page with a custom name
  • Comma-separated names for multiple pages with custom name
  • A Number for multiple pages
  • A name multiplied by a number for multiple pages with a custom name. like this MyCustomPage*3

parameters.name: Page name
parameters.description: Comma Separated Names or a Number or Name * Number

24173.name: POEditor
24173.description:
What is POEditor?


POEditor is a highly scalable online translation platform and localization management system, designed to bring together developers, product managers, translators, designers and copywriters in their effort of making multilingual software, and to automate the localization workflow.


Trusted by companies like Bosch, Adidas and Ubisoft, POEditor brings transparency to the localization process, boosting productivity and collaboration between product, design and localization teams and helping avoid possible localization bugs.


For more information on the POEditor platform, please visit: https://poeditor.com/


How Figma and POEditor work together


To connect Figma to a POEditor account, enter the API key of that POEditor account in the Figma plugin.


You’ll be able to create new projects on that account using the plugin, or work with projects which already exist in POEditor.


The POEditor plugin for Figma works both ways, so you can send texts from Figma files to POEditor translation projects and fetch translations from POEditor to Figma.


In POEditor, multiple translation options are available: 

  • assigning your own translators to specific languages, by adding them as contributors
  • crowdsourcing translations from your community, using public projects
  • ordering human translation services from integrated language service providers
  • using machine translation APIs from DeepL, Google or Bing


More information on how the POEditor Figma plugin works here.

23642.name: Markers
23642.description:
Create your own markers to help you keep track of you files.

Features

  1. Allows you to search for the markers that you have placed throughout your Figma file.
  2. Allows you to update all the green markers of a category to red to flag changes needed for a screen.
  3. Create a Dashboard to show which page contains what markers.


Instructions

  1. Create a page and call it ‘##Plugin components##’
  2. Create a component called ‘#traffic-status’
  3. The component should have two properties
  • Status, with two properties called red and green (compulsory).
  • Screen, as many as you need. Name needs to be lowercase and have no spacing.
  • Do not add them into a group or the plugin wont be able to find it.

I have created an instruction video to explain how to use it.

https://youtu.be/RLqVMvwIo9U

24199.name: Split text
24199.description: Split the text while keeping the original text style.
24199.release_notes:
Fixed a bug :
Where a child layer is added if the text can't be split!

24201.name: Rendition: Figma->React in one click
24201.description: Get high quality react code for your designs in one click.

24016.name: Font Switcher
24016.description:
Switch font family from the action search bar and keep the font weight.


The font-weight will be retained if the new font family has that weight.


How to:

  1. Select some nodes with texts (Text, Sticky, Connector, Shapes with text, etc.)
  2. Open quick action (Win: Ctrl+/ or Ctrl+P) - (Mac: Cmd + / or Cmd + P)
  3. Type "Font switcher" and press Tab
  4. Reach your font and press "Enter"

23830.name: Thumblisher
23830.description:
The easiest way to resize and scale your frames for different social media platforms.


Plugin Demo:

Thumblisher Video Tutorial


Expand your frames to the following Social Media Image Sizes :

Facebook: Profile, Cover, Post, Event, Ad, Story cover, Group cover.

Instagram: Profile, Post, Story, Ad, Thumbnails, IGTV.

Twitter: Profile, Cover, Post, Card, Ad

LinkedIn: Logo, Cover, Hero, Business Banner, Dynamic Ads.

YouTube: Cover Desktop, Cover Mobile, Display ads, Overlay ad, Companion banner ads, Dynamic Ads.

Pinterest: Profile, Board Display, Standard Pin, Overlay ad, Companion banner ads, Dynamic Ads.

TikTok: Profile.

Dribbble: Shot, Shot HD.

Producthunt: Thumbnail, Gallery.

Google Play: Portrait, Landscape.

App Store: Portrait, Landscape.


To use this plugin

  1. First, select your frame or image
  2. Choose the social media image size you’d like to generate for
  3. Click the “Create” button

24046.name: Figma to Handoff
24046.description:
With the Figma to Handoff, you can quickly convert your designs to HTML, CSS and Vue code.


It allows you to copy-paste Auto Layout enabled layers to Handoff. From the Handoff interface, you can export the code as a .zip file or copy-paste the code right into your IDE.


How it works

  1. Install the plugin
  2. Sign up for a free Handoff account
  3. In Figma, right-click → plugins → Figma to code with Handoff
  4. Select a layer
  5. Click 'Export layers'
  6. In Handoff, right-click → Paste from Figma


Tip: To make full use of this plugin and to ensure good code quality, please read the Handoff documentation article 'Importing from Figma'.

24093.name: Mark the page
24093.description: View the marked pages and quickly enter the marked page!

23977.name: Stack Theme Builder (Alpha)
23977.description:
Theme Builder for the upcoming version of Stack Browser



This plugin helps you to generate color palettes based on given base colors: Background, Spacebar, Accent, and Surface

24091.name: AlphaMasker
24091.description:
Quickly turn transparent frames or PNGs into masked knockout fill frames.


  1. Select a frame with transparency
  2. Run AlphaMasker
  3. Change the color of the resulting frame


AlphaMasker uses the selected frame to generate a transparent PNG which it uses as a mask layer for a solid color. This lets you quickly generate solid-color knockout illustrations with adjustable colors.

23721.name: Demo Station
23721.description:
Export from Figma to local clickable HTMLM with images. Includes Gallery and Element Inspector


More details:

https://github.com/MaxBazarov/demo-station-plugin


Beta 1

24103.name: Color Fixer
24103.description: Associates colors to styles if it finds matching or very similar ones. Just run the plugin.

23835.description:
